eventName: The Black Forest Wills A Dream
storyInfo: Magallan encounters a supernatural phenomenon in the Fjal Vetrtonn and finds herself rescued by an unfamiliar Sarkaz. The Mountains' Sami are extremely wary of the group and chase them away from their defensive line.

attributes.content: Do we have news on Lazal and the other men who disappeared?
attributes.name: Tenacious Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: Yeah, we can stop searching.
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: Demons have been through here.
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: The ice there has Arts damage. It was a hard fight.
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: They are all roots of the Frost Maple and respected warriors, but not even their bodies remained?
attributes.name: Tenacious Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: Bad weather is known to befall the icefield.
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: But this kind of weather has been happening far too often of late.
attributes.name: Tenacious Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: Hadn't Sami long since warned us through Eikthyrnir?
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: Come, we must reinforce the fortifications and keep a close eye on every mountain pass.
attributes.name: Solemn Sami Mountain Warrior

attributes.content: (Logs in notebook) 'We've entered the Fjal Vetrtonn. The current temperature is... 31 degrees below zero.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'So far, I have yet to find any comms stations within Sami borders... and haven't been able to make contact with Director Maryam's expedition team.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *sigh*... If Professor Mary isn't around, who am I even going to send these notes to? Every time he reads my reports, he points out all the phenomena I should've paid closer attention to...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'We've passed through the local settlement mentioned in previous expedition records: at the foot of the Fjal Vetrtonn, near the edge of the forest.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *huff*... Even though I only lost a single glove, it feels so cold.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Need a hand, Magallan?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Oh, it's alright, Simone. I'm almost done with this report! I'll be ready to leave the shelter and brave the blizzard soon!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Now where was I? Right...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'The settlement had vanished.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'I asked Simone—'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Quickly erases)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'I asked an accompanying Sami about this, and it seems that Sami tribes are known to move around.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Why did they move?
I tried looking into it, but couldn't figure anything out.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Simone told me that it was Sami herself. She told them that danger was drawing near and that they had to leave.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But the climate data we've collected so far aren't all that different from the historical record, and there don't seem to be any changes in long term trends either. So what kind of danger is Sami facing?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Looks like... the Scientific Investigation Section's data... needs to be updated.
Right, Sami is still a blind spot in our knowledge.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But it seems the Sami really don't like being disturbed.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Professor Mary, you've always wanted to work with them, but haven't been able to.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It takes so much effort to get our applications processed in Ursus. If we could just find a new path into the icefield through Sami and build more research stations, our expeditions would be so much easier.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Unfortunately... the Sami don't want anyone in the icefield...
Right...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Was I just... talking to Professor Mary?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Simone. Simone!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I just—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Do you see a group of people over there? There's too much snow; I can't quite...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Mag...allan...
I-Is it really Professor Mary?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Simone, I need to head over there for a look!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Director?

attributes.content: (Ah! It's really you! Thank goodness, I found you guys! I knew you'd be safe!)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Weird... How come I can't speak?)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (*huff*... *huff*... My heart's beating too fast... A-Am I trembling? Why?)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (No, no, no! I need to stop the Professor and take them back!)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Professor—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Mmf, mrrmrmff!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Shh.
Don't listen. Don't look. Don't speak.
I don't blame you, Simone. It's been a long time since your last visit. It's no wonder you didn't sense it.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Girl

attributes.content: Haha... I see, so now I'm a visitor here?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Not as much as her, but still a visitor. The route you two took hasn't been used for a long time.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Girl

attributes.content: *sigh* You're lucky I take this detour every time.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Girl

attributes.content: So the warriors still haven't accepted you, even now? But the land herself clearly regards you as a beloved child.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: ...In any case, thank you for your help, Typhon.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Mhm. No need to pay me back.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The food I hid around here is more than enough to last me a few months.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: So you said you were heading to the icefield to look for missing southerners?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Then let me come with you. The missing men must have run into trouble. I'll help you protect them.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Uh—Um—Eh, I can talk now...? Is it okay if I talk?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Listen—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...Why are you raising your hands?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Uh... Because I heard the Sami are very fierce? And they don't like it when others enter the icefield?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I-I'm really not plotting anything bad!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm? Well, the warriors here are indeed fierce, but I'm no warrior.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Anyway, I woke you up just now with my Arts, but you can still hear the voices, right?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Mm... Yeah, I can.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's okay. I've realized it's a hallucination by now. I'm not stupid enough to keep talking to it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Right, I should jot this down in my notes, too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So do you know what causes these hallucinations? Exhaustion due to the extreme weather? Maybe something in the water that paralyzes the central nervous system?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *sigh*... Come here. Your ear.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: (Whispers) Okay, go ahead and tell me.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Alright, now the other side.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Okay... Huh? Weren't you going to whisper something?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Did you just rub something on my ears? It felt kinda cold.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Now put this under your tongue and press down on it.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: M-Moss and a ball of mud?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I know that explorers sometimes boil leather when they're completely out of food, but I've never considered eating moss in an emergency...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Alright, Magallan, be brave and give it a shot!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Stop being so suspicious of everything. Just put it in your mouth.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Now you'll only hear your own voice and won't be bothered by those strange noises.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Really? You're so helpful!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Wait, but won't I be deaf to any environmental dangers, too? It'll also affect my balance when I climb. It's too risky.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. Just trust Typhon.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We'll take you somewhere where the snow's not contaminated.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah. We'll give you a hand signal when you can spit the mud out.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Until then, don't talk too loud. You don't want it to hear you.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hmm, alright...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The young explorer suddenly stops and looks in a direction where no one's standing.
The brief pause lasts only two seconds. She quickly follows Typhon's directions and squeezes the mudball into her mouth, as though nothing unusual had happened.
Yeah, I can't hear anything now.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Ehh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There's musbeast fur scattered in the snow. It's a kind of detection Arts.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Good thing you held Magallan back.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We couldn't escape the warriors' eyes, but at the very least our visit seems a little more respectful this way.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Should we have her spit out the mudball? You can fill her in on the situation.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: If her plan was to enter the icefield this way, then she probably knows nothing about the northern front.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: No need. Leave the negotiations to me. Most of these warriors would chase us off with their hammers the moment they hear Columbian or the common tongue.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ah... see?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: *sigh* It's the Legion. They aren't going to talk to us.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You, daughter of the Santalla Tree.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: Greetings, warriors of Treescar.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: You're with an outlander.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: And... the hunter with the black bow.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: But please don't be so quick to attack. This outlander asks nothing of Sami.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We simply seek to enter the endless icefield.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The Sami warriors surround them in silence. They show no intention of backing off.
Though silent, their stances remain unchanged, with their hands on their weapons. Regardless, Santalla seems to know exactly what it is they need to hear.

...I understand. It's against the rules. No one should enter the icefield rashly. You built these high walls not only to keep the icefield's disasters at bay, but also to stop the Sami and wild beasts.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: But her dear mentor has disappeared in the icefield. She is earnestly trying to rescue someone who is practically family to her, and I hope you can make an exception.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The Sami warriors do not move an inch.
...Please trust us. We will take care of the southerner and prevent her from acting rashly against Sami. She won't become lost, and absolutely won't become your enemy.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We are accompanying her in order to take care of any worst case scenarios that might happen to her or the missing men.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: ...Trust that black bow, too?
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: You want us to trust the daughter of a crazed Cyclops?
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: That black bow means nothing. She fights the same enemy as you.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Her mind may be clear, but that doesn't mean her weapon won't bring misfortune.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: There was a time when we brought back the belongings of every last fallen warrior, until we realized that the enemy could find us through their contaminated relics.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: I'm sure you know this well.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: —Simone from under the Santalla Tree.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: I am a shaman no longer, but if that identity will make you reconsider, then I am more than happy to use it.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: There are still many among us who remember the warrior who almost became a Snowpriest. But she ran from her duties, so we do not intend to bring up her past.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: Her power can still take care of those around her.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The team that went missing amounts to more than a dozen men. The northern warriors I know would never turn a blind eye with so many lives on the line.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: You must bear the harshness of fate, daughter of the Santalla Tree. Endure it. Do not run away.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: ...Those are Eikthyrnir's words.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Did he... learn something from his divination? About the whole northern realm?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I have no answers for outsiders.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: But Eikthyrnir has already led many a warrior south, to inform each tribe of Sami's whispers.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: If Sami has made her prophecy, I shan't insist on entering the icefield.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: But now that it's come to this, we lack the supplies to head back down the mountain and take the long way around.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Even though the demons' contamination spreads without end, we have no choice but to continue our journey through the mountains, and through the pass guarded by your warriors.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Supplies? You only have the southerners' shortcomings to blame. They claim the land a barren wilderness, which is why they find themselves unable to survive in nature.
attributes.name: Sami Mountain Scout

attributes.content: I'm simply asking that you—
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: *sigh* Let's go, Simone.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You don't owe them an explanation.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Wait, that hand signal... Are you for real?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah, trust me.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: —Just hold on a moment!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ugh... So bitter... *cough*... Let me explain!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm not a bad guy, I'm just an explorer! The only thing in these crates are reserve drones. I can open them up if you want a look!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm not trying to sneak into the icefield, either. I just didn't know how to get in touch with the Sami government to submit an application!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Er, wait, does Sami have a government? I haven't actually seen anything resembling one, but...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I do have the documents I was going to hand over to Ursus. My ID, exploration permit, and the abandoned route plans... They all prove that I'm just an explorer, nothing more.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Anyway, Simone and Typhon have both been so nice to me. Please don't blame them! If it's me that you're suspicious of, I'll explain everything!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: She's not imagining things.
Everyone's expressions grow increasingly solemn with every word she says.
They're all looking behind her, as though they too can hear her hallucinations.
Run, you birdbrain!
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You brought an omen of disaster right into the group!
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: This way!
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Is this the path you mentioned?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Ah—That was close! The arrow hit the rock!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thanks, rock! Thanks, Fjal Vetrtonn!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: They probably mistook it for one of us, in this thick snowfall.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Your Arts come in handy, Simone. I knew I could trust you to keep us hidden.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Okay, now this way.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: It's gotten quieter.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Mm... Let me check. Yeah, I don't see them anymore.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Good! We shook them off!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Or perhaps... they stopped giving chase.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Whatever the case, we should be safe now, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Phew... Hah...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: All of a sudden... I'm outta breath...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Give me your hand. I'll help you.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Th-Thanks... The expedition equipment and my protective gear are all just too heavy. When they designed this extreme north exploration gear, they probably didn't think we'd need to run in the mountains...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No, wait... I need to apologize!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I couldn't hear anything earlier, but it looked like you were bickering because of me. And then I got ahead of myself and started shouting.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The Director always tells me to think before I act, but... Maybe it's because I have no idea what's so scary about these hallucinations, but I didn't really think that through, did I?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No need to apologize.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Nature doesn't debate right and wrong. All that matters is closeness. The same goes for those northern warriors just now.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Uh... closeness...?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: They're just like, mm... like a chain of mountains. No matter what you say to them, you will never become part of the mountains. All you can do is try your hardest to surmount them.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Of course, you also can't tell the mountains that they're wrong and should be flat ground instead.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Ehh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Why are they so unwilling to talk it out?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's set aside whether they could even understand you. Those warriors normally have no need for words.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: See, if you and I lived together all day, every day, and everything we did was the same daily routine: patrolling, hunting, fighting... We wouldn't have much reason to talk.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hm, because we'd be too used to everything?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No. Because communication is only needed when we think different thoughts.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: That's why I called them a chain of mountains.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Besides, they have to deal with the Ursus, too.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: To them, they must be wary of any outlanders whose intentions they cannot discern at a single glance.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: It may seem a little cruel, but it's how they have to live... (In Sami) 'One must accept fate, no matter what form it takes.'
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: (In Sami) Fate... hm.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What's done is done. The signal I gave back there was for Simone to run. When you're dealing with those warriors, most of the time you're going to have to back down. You can't count on them giving way.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: That said, now we can't reach the icefield to find your teacher.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: *sigh* Yeah...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So what are you going to do now?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I guess... I'll go to Čappat to request help.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's the southernmost city in Sami, isn't it?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah, it's where a lot of Columbian companies have their only branch offices in Sami.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Now that the Ursus route is sealed off, it's the only place the Exploration Society can mount a rescue from.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'll rendezvous with them and try my best to collect information on the route. After all, nobody's really all that familiar with Sami.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'll keep escorting you, then.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I don't need payment. I have no use for most of the trinkets southerners offer. I just happen to have a client waiting for me in Čappat.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Whoa, thanks!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What about you, Simone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I promised I'd stay with you, didn't I?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ehehe.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But Typhon, where does this path lead?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I find it hard to imagine that there are still paths in this mountain that the scouts haven't discovered.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: That's because this takes us to where Arges lives.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...A Cyclops's cave.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah, I guess it's my home, too. At least, I grew up there.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I may have used Sarkaz Arts to cover our tracks, but any veteran shaman is bound to figure it out in an instant. But I doubt they'd want to disturb a Cyclops.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Heh, no one likes hearing the prophesized tragedies doomed to befall them, after all.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: If they'd kept chase, I'd have to count on Arges being home to help us out. Luckily they weren't so patient.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: This is making me feel uneasy, though.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: They gave up far too easily. Almost as if they abandoned us in the snow.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: There's nothing to fear; I'm watching our surroundings.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The snow creaks beneath their feet.
Oh right... The disaster you two mentioned earlier... What's that all about?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If we're able to find the source of the auditory hallucinations and bring back samples to Rhine for analysis, maybe we could find a more long-term remedy!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Neither of them answer Magallan right away. Instead, the sound of their boots sinking into the snow grows louder by the step.
What a strange question. Do you people think that Catastrophes, the cold, or the fangs of a mangler will just up and disappear one day?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The disaster is relatively less common, but if it comes knocking on your door, you cannot defeat it.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hm, just like now.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The sound of their footsteps in the snow stops. While she wasn't paying attention, the snow had become light as a feather. Magallan blinks and does a double take.
A-Am I hallucinating again, or is...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...is it snowing upwards?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No, your eyes aren't deceiving you.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The snow is floating midair, above our heads.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I... I need to gather samples!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Give me a minute to activate the drones!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A snowflake that's still floating upward...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hah, got it! Next, snow that's accumulated midair...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Watch out!
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The snow crumbles downward.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: And from what I can barely make out given the visibility, there seems to be a lot more accumulated in the sky up ahead.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: If we keep going, it's enough to bury all three of us once it comes crumbling down.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: This phenomenon must've been around for a while. They already knew about it, so they stopped giving chase. They knew we were prey driven into a dead end.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Not even a Snowpriest's Arts can do anything about this... and nor can I. Any snow I summon will only float upward and break free from my control.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: —Wait, Magallan! Stay close to us! It's dangerous to go alone!
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: It's okay. I just need to get a little farther away to collect samples!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If the drones lose their balance while gathering and knock down the midair snow, only I'll be buried!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Whoa, that was close!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Do you feel it? The snow is trembling.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Each step we take awakens it.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: But a girl like her won't stop here.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Give me your hand.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Most people don't like doing this, but given the circumstances, we should give it a shot.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Right, to make sure the blood flows onto the arrowhead, I'll need to cut a little deeper. But you don't need me to worry about you, right?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Do what you must, Typhon. Just don't cut too deep because our hands are numbed by the cold.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The snow's coming down more quickly.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah. The black seeds buried in the soil know my bow and arrows. This is exactly why people always misunderstand me.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Okay, it's just Magallan left—
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: —Magallan?! What's your status?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Oh, I'm fine! It's just the snow fell down and blocked the path...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let me switch to the snow clearing module.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Okay! You two can come on over now!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Give me your hand first. Take off your glove.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Er, gimme a bit of time to steel myself first.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Okay, here!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That'll do it.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The arrow, soaked in the three women's blood, breezes through the cold wind. With a loud bang, an entire slab of frozen snow comes crashing down onto a cliff to the side.
...Sarkaz witchcraft.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The snow up to there won't fall anymore. I'll keep an eye out for the next place that looks dangerous and deal with it ahead of time in the same way.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Let's keep going.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I found a few more dead hornbeasts close to the spring water.
attributes.name: Sami Forest Inhabitant

attributes.content: We've followed the Samivilinn, the will of the land, and moved our entire tribe from the foot of the mountain all the way through the tundra.
attributes.name: Sami Forest Inhabitant

attributes.content: So why aren't we free of the disaster's corrosion yet?!
attributes.name: Sami Forest Inhabitant

attributes.content: We should try the divination one more time.... Just one more time, to see when the land will finally grant us peace.
attributes.name: Sami Forest Inhabitant

attributes.content: ...Or do you mean the Cyclops that traveled with us back then was telling the truth? That there would come a day when desolation would befall our tribe?
attributes.name: Sami Forest Inhabitant

attributes.content: Didn't you say that... somebody lived here?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yeah. And that I used to live here, too.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: *sigh* She's not here, as usual.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: But... Th-Th-This is a cave...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah, too bad Simone had to leave because something came up... If she were here, she could tell me if this is normal or not...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Uh, nothing! Just wondering how I should describe this place in my notes.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Whatever works for you.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Here, jerky and salt. Arges isn't stingy. You can take whatever you want.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Now we should have enough supplies to make it to the bottom of the mountain.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Thanks, Typhon, but hold on!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I don't know this Arges you're talking about. Seems a bit rude...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm, she herself said, and I quote: (in Sarkaz) 'Anything with its curtain pulled open can be shared.'
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You can take that to mean she doesn't care.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Heh, well, don't mind if I do.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Also... is it okay if I make a detailed record of the cave in its current state?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I want to take a few pictures, too! I promise I won't make a mess!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Why even ask? When you're done, come by the fire and rest.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Gotcha!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Right, and can I look at these notes, too?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Go ahead. Only she can understand what's in there anyway.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Okay... Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Right, Typhon, there's something I've been meaning to ask.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Logically speaking, when you hallucinate, you shouldn't hear any words you don't know, or any concepts you've never heard of, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm, I'm not sure I follow your 'logic.' But what about it?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Anyway, take a look at this page.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'When the box is opened, Andskotarnir will realize.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's the last thing I heard the Director say, before you helped me cut off the noise from my surroundings.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This Ursus communicator... It's getting a signal.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The question is... how long ago was it sent?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: ...Reporting... to army... border guards...
attributes.name: Broken Transmission

attributes.content: With... the help of Liebafowl... Black Mark... in Sami...
attributes.name: Broken Transmission
